LocalCommitTimerEnd.summary: The Message send from a Client to itself when the timer for the LocalCommit timer expires .

DigestRequest.summary: The of the request for which the timer ended.

Timestamp.summary: The timestamp of the request for which the timer ended.

param.name: digestRequest
param.summary: The of digest of the request of this message.

param.name: timestamp
param.summary: The timestamp of the request of this message.
